# Developing
## Debugging
To debug use "npm" configurations. 
Fx to debug validate-manifest.js add this:

![debug.png](debug.png)

## npm exec 
To run a .js file directly from this repo
fx
`exec install-urcap [path_to_manifest.yaml] [path_to_manifest-spec.json] `

# Validation
The following scripts can now perform validation:
### [validate-manifest.js](bin/validate-manifest.js) handles validating a manifest.
`npm run validata-manifest [manifest.yaml] [manifest-spec.json]` will validate the given manifest with the given schema
The Schema can be given either bu URL or filePath

### [install-urcap.js](bin/install-urcap.js) 
If a second argument to a schema is supplied, it will validate the manifest.yaml file against the schema.
`npm run install-urcap [urcapx-blob] [manifest-spec.json]`
